nz.govt.natlib.meta.harvester
Class DTDXmlParserListener

java.lang.Object
  nz.govt.natlib.fx.XMLParserListener
      nz.govt.natlib.meta.harvester.DTDXmlParserListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParserListener
public class DTDXmlParserListener
extends XMLParserListener

Extends the XMLParserListener to hold a DTD name and force opening and closing tags to uppercase. Most of the logic is extended from the XMLParserListener itself.

Author:
bbeaumont
